import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import "../assets/css/layout.css" import { Nav } from "react-bootstrap" import Breadcrumb from "../components/common/breadcrumb" import PagnationTool from "../PagnationTool" import one from "../assets/images/user/1.jpg" import axios from "axios" import Cookie from "js-cookie" const RecomendList = () => { const history = useHistory() let [누른탭, 누른탭변경] = useState(0) const [waitguide, setwaitguide] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let form = new FormData() form.append("index", 1) form.append("type", 1) axios .post("/api/v1/guide/list", form, { headers: { Authorization: Cookie.get("token") } }) .then(response => { console.log(response) if (response.data.status === "success") { setwaitguide(response.data.data.list) } }) .catch(err => { alert("공지사항을 불러오는데 실패했습니다.") }) }, []) return ( <>
